Text.Page:
(The pages are bloodstained. You can only make out a few words.)

Demonic servant... wanted... souls, souls of other demonic servants...
...Evil gods were furious... punished demons... inferno.

(There's a note on the corner of one page.)

According to the man, it is partway between the divine realm and the mortal realm.
...Elleon... my adventurous brother...

(At the top of the blurred page, you find a clear note.)

The man will greatly aid my future plans.
It breaks my heart, but I must bear with this sacrifice.Close the tome.
